```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r flippers, echo=FALSE}

inputPanel(
  
  selectInput(inputId = "pick_spp",
              label = "Pick your penguin species:",
              choices = c("Adelie", 
                          "Chinstrap", 
                          "Gentoo"))
  
)


```
